fields.helpSection:
Login to your discord account 
 Go to Dashboard -> Edit Profile 
 To the right side, you should see the API key associated with your user account

fields.description: Company name registered with discord account
fields.helpSection:
Enter the comapny name that you provided when you signed up to discord 
 If your discord account URL is: acmecorp.discord.com then your domain name is acmecorp
